title: What is new product development? - Quora

response.answer_text: New product development is a series of steps which depend on the nature of the product being developed. Is it new, revolutionary, or is it just a improvement or development of an existing product? In general, production development has an object of maximizing the profit from selling the item, or increasing it market share. If the product is new or significant departure of an existing product, the manufacturing structure needs to developed. This is based on expected forecast sales, cost structure, market potential. If applicable, patents or trademark protection needs to sought.A manufacturer needs to be brought on board, or a manufacturing line developed.A marketing, sale and marketing, and branding campaign needs to be developed.A sales force structure needs to be put in place,A management and accounting systems needs to be instituted.
